snippet: On Thursday evening, the Miller Theater presented a composer portrait of Rand Steiger that showed how viscerally affecting computer-processed music can be.
lead_paragraph: On Thursday evening, the Miller Theater presented a composer portrait of Rand Steiger that showed how viscerally affecting computer-processed music can be.

headline.seo: Rand Steiger Featured in Composer Portraits Series
headline.main: Sounds That Fly on Digital Wings
headline.print_headline: Sounds That Fly on Digital Wings
